Game
Class Game

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Canvas
          Game.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
ImageObserver, MenuContainer, Serializable, Runnable, Accessible
public class Game
extends Canvas
implements Runnable

The main game class for the game. Everything starts here and is run through this class. Lukers 1/28/14

Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

Game

public Game()
Sets up the JFrame and adds the game. Also starts the timer

Method Detail

calculateScore

public int calculateScore()
Calculates score based on accuracy, kills, stage, and time survived

init

public void init()
Initializes all of the things that the game needs to run

main

public static void main(String[] args)
Call this and it'll all go.

render

public void render()
Renders entities and tiles. The order in which things are rendered determines what appears on top of what. Also draws everything to the screen

run

public void run()
Calls the init() method and gets the game going. Sets a frame rate as well so different computers should run at the same rate. This is called by the thread stuff.

Specified by:
run in interface Runnable

start

public void start()
Allows for the threads to be synced

stop

public void stop()
Allows for the threads to be synced

tick

public void tick()
Updates the game
